page.title: 05SHOPPING IN DRUMNADROCHIT
page.content: {Drumnadrochit}village serves the every day needs of its people well with 3 {grocer shops}.One of these also provides a{mobile van}which serves those in Remote areas,or the{elderly who can't walk to the shops for there messages.Another is also the{sub-post {office}for the local area.There are also{specialist shops}selling electrical goods,sports gear,antiques as well as a uni-sex hairdresser. Many people however go to{Inverness}to shop.A lot go to large supermarkets where they buy a weeks messages or more. They do this as goods are much cheaper in town.One supermarket provides a{free bus}for shoppers,though most people go by car.People also go to{Inverness}to visit the big chain stores and specialist shops like clothing and furniture.
